directions: [["Heat oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add onion; cook 3 minutes, stirring frequently. "],["Add ginger and garlic, cook 30 seconds, stirring constantly. "],["Add rice; cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Stir in coconut milk, broth, cinnamon stick, and salt; bring to a boil."],["Cover and simmer 18 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. Remove from heat; let stand 5 minutes. "],["Drizzle with lime juice and fluff with a fork. Sprinkle with green onions. "],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
